name: Jelly Copter
description:
Fly, flap and flee as fast as you can, but watch out! How long will you survive before you crash?

FLAP your way to glory and beat your friends’ high scores

DODGE sudden obstacles, stinky cheese and flaming chilis

COLLECT all the wacky characters for maximum flappy fun

Think you can fly the furthest?

Good luck, my flappy friend!
